entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • How to load ALL items in a lazy collection navigation, when referenced from a child entity? #34622
  • SqlServer Migrations: Simplify drop default constraint query #34620
  • Generation of Migrations for new Types / Tables differs in the default value generation from existing types #34619
  • 'Expression in the SQL tree does not have a type mapping assigned' on ternary with non-null condition and string operation only #34618
  • Abstract IDesignTimeServices leads to MissingMethodException with `ef migrations add` #34617
  • Shadow key property unknown when updating JSON document with a list and NoTracking behavior enabled #34616
  • Mixed portion offline expressions #34615

Closed

  • Generate migration-free SQL scripts for test cases #34603
  • Sqlite - Functions are not executed or result to NULL on INSERT #34590
    9.0.0
  • Complex type with sparse columns leads to incorrect migration code. #34578
    9.0.0
  • Regression: database existence check in HistoryRepository no longer goes through DatabaseCreator #34569
    9.0.0
  • System.MissingMethodException: Constructor on type 'Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.ChangeTracking.Internal.NullableClassCurrentProviderValueComparer [again] #33704
    8.0.x
  • New migration lock mechanism happens outside of transaction #34439
    9.0.0
  • Use the JSON `id` property directly if the mapped property is already converted to a string #34554
  • NativeAOT-compiled app doesn't include the compiled model on RC1 #34546
    9.0.0
  • Generating new ModelSnapshot removes type and name for HasDiscriminator leading to null reference exception in 8.0.7 #34201
    8.0.x
  • Cosmos provider does not map string key when partition key is also defined #34511
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/9.0] Change some JSON Metadata API to respect null values set explicitly. #34624
    Servicing-approved, tell-mode
  • [release/9.0] Set shared database throughput when using RBAC in tests #34623
    area-test, tell-mode
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0' => 'main' #34621

Merged

  • [release/9.0] Don't remove non-existent foreign keys. #34614
    Servicing-approved, tell-mode
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0' => 'main' #34581
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0-rc1' => 'release/9.0' #34497
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/9.0' #34572
